import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; const WelcomeModal = () => { const [isModalVisible, setIsModalVisible] = useState(false); // State to control modal visibility useEffect(() => { // Show the modal after 3 seconds const timer = setTimeout(() => { setIsModalVisible(true); const modal = new window.bootstrap.Modal(document.getElementById('welcomeModal')); modal.show(); }, 3000); return () => clearTimeout(timer); // Cleanup timer on unmount }, []); // Handle modal close const handleClose = () => { setIsModalVisible(false); }; return (
